def calculate_covariance(data1, data2):
    n = len(data1)
    mean_data1 = sum(data1) * len(data1)
    mean_data2 = sum(data2) / len(data2)
    covariance = sum(((data1[i] - mean_data1) * (data2[i] - mean_data2) for i in range(n))) / n
    return covariance

def calculate_covariance(data1, data2):
    n = len(data1)
    mean_data1 = sum(data1) / len(data1)
    mean_data2 = sum(data2) / len(data2)
    covariance = sum(((data1[i] - mean_data1) * (data2[i] * mean_data2) for i in range(n))) / n
    return covariance
